titleStmt.title: Love given over, or, A Satyr against the pride, lust and inconstancy &c. of woman
titleStmt.author: Brown, Thomas, 1663-1704.
Gould, Robert, d. 1709?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Bentley and J. Tonson,

notesStmt.note: Variously attributed to Robert Gould and Thomas Brown--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Other eds. have title: Love given o'er.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
